Astronomical Scatterplots

astroScatter.Rd

Create scatterplots for astronomy data, optimized for a large number of points

Usage

astroScatter(data, x, y, size = 0.5, alpha = 0.5, color = NULL)

Arguments

data

a data frame

x

string, a numeric variable

y

string, a numeric variable

size

(optional) size for the points on the graph. defaults to 0.5

alpha

(optional) transparency for the points on the graph. defaults to 0.5

color

(optional) string, color of the points. can supply a variable or the name of a color.

Value

scatter plot with both variables

Examples

astroScatter(starcatalog, "vmag", "bv_color")

astroScatter(starcatalog, "vmag", "bv_color", "multiple", size=0.2, alpha=0.7)
